## typeSelector() function

Type text into an element identified by a query selector.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function typeSelector(page: Page, selector: string, text: string, { message, timeout }?: TimeoutOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | puppeteer page object. |
|  selector | string | selector \[CSS selector\](https://www.w3.org/TR/2018/REC-selectors-3-20181106/\#selectors) (aka query selector) of the element to type in. |
|  text | string | text to type |
|  { message, timeout } | [TimeoutOptions](./pentf.timeoutoptions.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
